channel.title: Xbox 360 mic for computer?
channel.description:
Is there any way I can hook up my xbox 360 mic to my computer? My old mic got chewed to shit by my cat and it won't work anymore. I know you can use a controller+mic on the computer if your controller is wired, but my controller is wireless :\
Is there any way I can still hook it up to my computer without a wired controller?
If there isn't, I'll probably go buy a new mic soon, I was just in the middle of a project and I'm trying to get it back ASAP.

item.title: Xbox 360 mic for computer?
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

maybe bluetooth?

i know my teacher does that with his xbox.

Read full topic

item.title: Xbox 360 mic for computer?
item.dc:creator: @Cruzer Cruzer
item.description:
@Cruzer wrote:

Maybe if you have the play and charge kit. Otherwise no.

Read full topic
